mem[0]  = 32'b00000000010000000000000100010011; // addi x2, x0, 4
mem[1]  = 32'b00000000001000000000000110010011; // addi x3, x0, 2
mem[2]  = 32'b00000000001100010000000010110011; // add x1, x2, x3
mem[3]  = 32'b01000000001100010000000010110011; // sub x1, x2, x3
mem[4]  = 32'b00000000001100010001000010110011; // sll x1, x2, x3
mem[5]  = 32'b00000000001100010010000010110011; // slt x1, x2, x3
mem[6]  = 32'b00000000001100010011000010110011; // sltu x1, x2, x3
mem[7]  = 32'b00000000001100010100000010110011; // xor x1, x2, x3
mem[8]  = 32'b00000000001100010101000010110011; // srl x1, x2, x3
mem[9]  = 32'b01000000001100010101000010110011; // sra x1, x2, x3
mem[10] = 32'b00000000001100010110000010110011; // or x1, x2, x3
mem[11] = 32'b00000000001100010111000010110011; // and x1, x2, x3
mem[12] = 32'b00000000000100000000000001110011; // EBREAK
